verses.roman:
prabhu lāgi' dharma-karma chāḍe bhakta-gaṇa
bhakta-dharma-hāni prabhura nā haya sahana

synonyms: prabhu lāgi'-for the sake of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dharma-karma—all prescribed duties; chāḍe—give up; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; bhakta-dharma—of the duty of a devotee; hāni—the abandonment; prabhura—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā haya—is not; sahana—tolerable.
translation: All the devotees would abandon all kinds of duties for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's sake, yet the Lord did not like the devotees' giving up their promised duties.
